name: Send Mixmax messages from new Google Sheets spreadsheet rows
description: Make will watch for new rows in a specified Google Sheets spreadsheet at regular intervals and create message in Mixmax using information received. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13DgxFZ0Rj4C79emFlTZ1ylLlvXOZ3HTITvY60zB8KHY/edit?usp=sharing).
